channel.title: Nuno Coração on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Nuno Coração on Automaly

item.title: D365 and Dataverse - Integration Overview
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive overview of integration patterns and capabilities between Dynamics 365 applications and Microsoft Dataverse for seamless data connectivity.

item.title: Truncate a table using X++
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to truncate large SQL tables efficiently in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using X++ SqlDataDictionary class. Includes proper permission handling and security considerations.

item.title: Throw behaviour in Xpp
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master X++ exception handling with practical examples showing the difference between error() and throw error() statements. Learn how throw affects transaction control and loop execution in Dynamics 365.

item.title: No data is inserted/modified in temporary table when processing an SRS report using Pre-process
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshoot SSRS report preprocessing issues in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. Learn why takeOwnershipOfTempTable() is required for temporary table manipulation in RDP classes.

item.title: Using Kusto functions in Power BI datasource
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to create and use Azure Data Explorer (ADX) Kusto functions as Power BI data sources. Simplify data access and enhance reporting with parameterized functions.
